entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sandy Lake

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
